PHRASE.LANG: kName
Nanook the Polar Bear Cub
Nanook l'oursonne polaire
Nanuk das Eisbärjunge
Nanook il cucciolo di orso polare
Nanuka, la osezna polar
새끼 북극곰 - 나눅
Nanook the Polar Bear Cub
北極熊崽納努克
北極熊崽納努克
Nanook the Polar Bear Cub
kDesc
Nanook can be a cheeky little cub, scampering off and causing mischief, but she's always forgiven because she's just so adorable! [#Legal]
Nanook peut-être une petite oursonne très espiègle et coquine et faire plein de bêtises, mais on lui pardonne toujours car elle est si adorable ! [#Legal]
Nanuk hat es faustdick hinter den Ohren und zieht gerne auf eigene Faust los, um jede Menge Unfug anzurichten. Aber weil sie so niedlich ist, kann man ihr einfach nicht lange böse sein! [#Legal]
Nanook può essere un piccolo cucciolo impertinente e causare un po' di danni in giro, ma è adorabile e si fa sempre perdonare! [#Legal]
Nanuka es una osezna un poco impertinente, correteando por ahí y siendo una revoltosa. ¡Aunque siempre se le perdona porque es tan adorable ! [#Legal]
나눅은 철부지 새끼 곰이라 여기 저기 뛰어 다니며 말썽을 피우지만, 너무 사랑스러워서 항상 용서를 받곤 해요! [#Legal]
Nanook can be a cheeky little cub, scampering off and causing mischief, but she's always forgiven because she's just so adorable! [#Legal]
納努克可能是一個厚臉皮的小傢夥，蹦蹦跳跳，調皮搗蛋，但她總會得到原諒，因為她就是這麼的可愛！ [#Legal]
納努克可能是一個厚臉皮的小傢夥，蹦蹦跳跳，調皮搗蛋，但她總會得到原諒，因為她就是這麼的可愛！ [#Legal]
Nanook can be a cheeky little cub, scampering off and causing mischief, but she's always forgiven because she's just so adorable! [#Legal]
